General.Name: Wei Long Grape Wine Co Ltd
General.Description: WEILONG GRAPE WINE CO., Ltd processes, produces, and sells wines in China. The company operates through two segments, Wine Production and Sales; and Agricultural and Animal Husbandry Production. It offers organic, red, white, green, rosé, sweet, and sparkling, as well as organic, traditional, and grape distilled wines; grape special wine; and brandy. The company is also engaged in grape and orange tree planting, as well as crop farming; and trading businesses. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Longkou, China.
General.Address: West of South First Road, Longkou, China, 265704
